original_text: A slave cannot work for two masters at the same time. Maybe he will hate one of the masters, but he will love the other one. Or he will work well for one master, but he will think bad things about the other one. God and money are like different masters. You cannot work for both of them.’
korean_text: 집 하인이 두 주인을 섬길 수 없나니 혹 이를 미워하고 저를 사랑하거나 혹 이를 중히 여기고 저를 경히 여길 것임이니라 너희는 하나님과 재물을 겸하여 섬길 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: A slave cannot work for two masters
sentences.korean_translation: 한 종은 두 주인을 섬길 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Maybe he will hate one of the masters
sentences.korean_translation: 아마 그는 한 주인을 미워할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but he will love the other one
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 한 주인은 사랑할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Or he will work well for one master
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그는 한 주인을 위해 잘 일할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but he will think bad things
God and money are like different masters
You cannot work for both of them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 둘 다를 위해 일할 수 없습니다
